languages.text: "Интересно, кто донес эту новость". {n}Абеляр презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Впрочем, мне от вас скрывать нечего. В последнее время рулевые все чаще сбиваются с курсов, а рапорты не перестают противоречить друг другу. Беспорядки не прекратились и после разжалований, так что я лично взялся провести расследование".

traits.locale_text: "Интересно, кто донес эту новость". {n}Абеляр презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Впрочем, мне от вас скрывать нечего. В последнее время пилоты все чаще сбиваются с курсов, а рапорты не перестают противоречить друг другу. Беспорядки не прекратились и после разжалований, так что я лично взялся провести расследование".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "And who brought this piece of news to you, I wonder?" {n}Abelard lets out a scornful snort.{/n} "Then again, I have nothing to hide from you. Of late, the helmsmen have been going off course with increasing frequency, and the reports are full of contradicting accounts. The problem continued even after several demotions were handed out, so I took it upon myself to investigate."
languages.original_text: "Интересно, кто донес эту новость". {n}Абеляр презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Впрочем, мне от вас скрывать нечего. В последнее время рулевые все чаще сбиваются с курсов, а рапорты не перестают противоречить друг другу. Беспорядки не прекратились и после разжалований, так что я лично взялся провести расследование".

Of late, the pilots have been going off course with increasing frequency, and the reports are full of contradicting accounts. The problem continued even after several demotions were handed out, so I took it upon myself to investigate."

traits.locale_text: "And who brought this piece of news to you, I wonder?" {n}Abelard lets out a scornful snort.{/n} "Then again, I have nothing to hide from you. Of late, the helmsmen have been going off course with increasing frequency, and the reports are full of contradicting accounts. The problem continued even after several demotions were handed out, so I took it upon myself to investigate."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我想知道，是谁把这件事情报告给您的？”{n}阿贝拉德发出了一声轻蔑的冷笑。{/n}“但话说回来，这件事情没什么好隐瞒的。最近，舵手偏离航线的频率越来越高，而且报告中充满了矛盾之处。即便是我降职了好几个人之后，这个问题依然没有解决，于是我主动进行了调查。”
languages.original_text: "And who brought this piece of news to you, I wonder?" {n}Abelard lets out a scornful snort.{/n} "Then again, I have nothing to hide from you. Of late, the helmsmen have been going off course with increasing frequency, and the reports are full of contradicting accounts. The problem continued even after several demotions were handed out, so I took it upon myself to investigate."

traits.locale_text: “我想知道，是谁把这件事情报告给您的？”{n}阿贝拉德发出了一声轻蔑的冷笑。{/n}“但话说回来，这件事情没什么好隐瞒的。最近，舵手偏离航线的频率越来越高，而且报告中充满了矛盾之处。即便是我降职了好几个人之后，这个问题依然没有解决，于是我主动进行了调查。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "And who brought this piece of news to you, I wonder?" {n}Abelard lets out a scornful snort.{/n} "Then again, I have nothing to hide from you. Of late, the helmsmen have been going off course with increasing frequency, and the reports are full of contradicting accounts. The problem continued even after several demotions were handed out, so I took it upon myself to investigate."

languages.text: «¿Y quién le ha contado esta noticia?». {n}Abelard resopla, desdeñoso.{/n} «Por otra parte, tampoco tengo nada que ocultarle. Últimamente, los timoneles se han estado desviando con una frecuencia cada vez mayor y los informes están llenos de versiones contradictorias de los hechos. Cuando el problema persistió después de varias degradaciones de rango, decidí investigar personalmente».
languages.original_text: "And who brought this piece of news to you, I wonder?" {n}Abelard lets out a scornful snort.{/n} "Then again, I have nothing to hide from you. Of late, the helmsmen have been going off course with increasing frequency, and the reports are full of contradicting accounts. The problem continued even after several demotions were handed out, so I took it upon myself to investigate."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y quién le ha contado esta noticia?». {n}Abelard resopla, desdeñoso.{/n} «Por otra parte, tampoco tengo nada que ocultarle. Últimamente, los timoneles se han estado desviando con una frecuencia cada vez mayor y los informes están llenos de versiones contradictorias de los hechos. Cuando el problema persistió después de varias degradaciones de rango, decidí investigar personalmente».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「誰がこの報せをあなたに？」{n}アベラルドは軽蔑したかのように鼻息を漏らす。{/n}「私には、何も隠すことはございません。ここ最近、操舵手はコースを外れる事が増え、報告も矛盾したものが多くなっております。何度か降格処分がくだされてもなお問題は続いていたため、私が調査することになったのです」
languages.original_text: "And who brought this piece of news to you, I wonder?" {n}Abelard lets out a scornful snort.{/n} "Then again, I have nothing to hide from you. Of late, the helmsmen have been going off course with increasing frequency, and the reports are full of contradicting accounts. The problem continued even after several demotions were handed out, so I took it upon myself to investigate."

traits.locale_text: 「誰がこの報せをあなたに？」{n}アベラルドは軽蔑したかのように鼻息を漏らす。{/n}「私には、何も隠すことはございません。ここ最近、操舵手はコースを外れる事が増え、報告も矛盾したものが多くなっております。何度か降格処分がくだされてもなお問題は続いていたため、私が調査することになったのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Und wer mag Euch diese Nachricht überbracht haben, frage ich mich?" {n}Abelard schnaubt verächtlich.{/n} "Andererseits habe ich nichts vor Euch zu verbergen. Die Steuerleute kommen in letzter Zeit immer öfter vom Kurs ab, und die Berichte sind voller Widersprüche. Das Problem bestand auch nach mehreren Degradierungen noch weiter, daher habe ich nachgeforscht."
languages.original_text: "And who brought this piece of news to you, I wonder?" {n}Abelard lets out a scornful snort.{/n} "Then again, I have nothing to hide from you. Of late, the helmsmen have been going off course with increasing frequency, and the reports are full of contradicting accounts. The problem continued even after several demotions were handed out, so I took it upon myself to investigate."

traits.locale_text: "Und wer mag Euch diese Nachricht überbracht haben, frage ich mich?" {n}Abelard schnaubt verächtlich.{/n} "Andererseits habe ich nichts vor Euch zu verbergen. Die Steuerleute kommen in letzter Zeit immer öfter vom Kurs ab, und die Berichte sind voller Widersprüche. Das Problem bestand auch nach mehreren Degradierungen noch weiter, daher habe ich nachgeforscht."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je me demande bien comment cette nouvelle est parvenue à vos oreilles, {n}répond Abélard avec un grognement dédaigneux.{/n} Enfin, je n'ai rien à vous cacher. J'ai récemment remarqué que les timoniers déviaient du cap de plus en plus fréquemment et que les rapports étaient remplis de contradictions. Comme le problème persistait même après plusieurs rétrogradations, j'ai décidé de mener l'enquête. »
languages.original_text: "And who brought this piece of news to you, I wonder?" {n}Abelard lets out a scornful snort.{/n} "Then again, I have nothing to hide from you. Of late, the helmsmen have been going off course with increasing frequency, and the reports are full of contradicting accounts. The problem continued even after several demotions were handed out, so I took it upon myself to investigate."

traits.locale_text: « Je me demande bien comment cette nouvelle est parvenue à vos oreilles, {n}répond Abélard avec un grognement dédaigneux.{/n} Enfin, je n'ai rien à vous cacher. J'ai récemment remarqué que les timoniers déviaient du cap de plus en plus fréquemment et que les rapports étaient remplis de contradictions. Comme le problème persistait même après plusieurs rétrogradations, j'ai décidé de mener l'enquête. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Milletin de ağzında bakla ıslanmıyor. Kimden duydunuz acaba?" {n}Abelard öfkeyle homurdanıyor.{/n} "Gerçi sizden saklayacak bir şeyim yok. Şu sıralar serdümenlerin sıklıkla rotadan çıktıklarını görüyorum. Raporlarda da çelişen bilgiler var. Birkaç kişinin rütbesini düşürmemize rağmen mesele çözülmedi. Ben de soruşturmayı bizzat yürütmek için kolları sıvadım."
languages.original_text: "And who brought this piece of news to you, I wonder?" {n}Abelard lets out a scornful snort.{/n} "Then again, I have nothing to hide from you. Of late, the helmsmen have been going off course with increasing frequency, and the reports are full of contradicting accounts. The problem continued even after several demotions were handed out, so I took it upon myself to investigate."

traits.locale_text: "Milletin de ağzında bakla ıslanmıyor. Kimden duydunuz acaba?" {n}Abelard, öfkeyle homurdanıyor.{/n} "Gerçi sizden saklayacak bir şeyim yok. Şu sıralar serdümenlerin sıklıkla rota dışı hareket ettiklerini gördüm. Raporlarda da çelişen bilgiler var. Birkaç kişinin rütbesini düşürmemize rağmen mesele çözülmedi. Ben de soruşturmayı bizzat yürütmek için kolları sıvadım."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
